TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DesignerGlyph extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 在活动设计器上的 Z 顺序的最顶层位置绘制标志符号。

span.span: Draws a glyph at the top-most Z order position on an activity designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 类是在工作流设计图面上使用的所有设计器标志符号的基类。The class is the base class for all designer glyphs used on a workflow design surface. 活动设计器开发人员可以使用从 继承的类在 的图面上绘制自定义标志符号。Activity designer developers can use classes that inherit from to draw custom glyphs onto the surface of an . 类在 Z 顺序的顶层绘制此类标志符号，这会根据自定义标志符号的 值将自定义标志符号直观地置于设计器上的所有其他标志符号之上。 classes draw such glyphs at the top-level Z order, which places the custom glyph visually on top of all other glyphs on the designer based on the value of the custom glyph. 属性的值越小，表示优先级越高，因此会在活动设计器的 Z 顺序的最顶层位置绘制标志符号。A lower value for the property indicates a higher priority and therefore draws the glyph at the top-most Z order position on an activity designer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个从 类派生的标志符号类。The following code example demonstrates a glyph class that derives from the class. 该代码重写 和 方法。The code overrides the and methods. 此代码示例摘自工作流监视器 SDK 示例中的 DesignerGlyphProvider.cs 文件。This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the DesignerGlyphProvider.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[工作流监视器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2)。For more information, see [Workflow Monitor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#132](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#132)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#132](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets1.vb#132)]

span.para: 继承自，必须重写以下成员： 。
When you inherit from , you must override the following members: .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非在派生类中重写，否则 将返回与标志符号关联的活动设计器的边界。Unless overridden in a derived class, returns the bounds of the activity designer with which the glyph is associated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法。The following code example demonstrates how you can override the method. 该代码设置自定义标志符号对象的大小和位置。The code sets the size and location of the custom glyph object. 此代码示例摘自工作流监视器 SDK 示例中的 DesignerGlyphProvider.cs 文件。This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the DesignerGlyphProvider.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[工作流监视器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2)。For more information, see [Workflow Monitor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2). summary.span: 表示 的可能的最高优先级。

span.span: Represents the highest priority possible for a .
This value is a constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的值越小，表示优先级越高，因此会在活动设计器的 Z 顺序的最顶层位置绘制标志符号。A lower value for the property indicates a higher priority and therefore draws the glyph at the top-most Z order position on an activity designer. 值字段为 0。The value of the field is 0. > [!NOTE] > 此常数值用作创建自定义标志符号时的一个准则。This constant value serves as a guideline when creating custom glyphs. 设计自定义标志符号时，可以对 属性随意使用不同的值。You are free to use different values for the property when designing your custom glyph.

summary.span: 表示 的可能的最低优先级。

span.span: Represents the lowest priority possible for a .
This value is a constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的值越大，表示优先级越低，因此会在活动设计器的 Z 顺序的最底层位置绘制标志符号。A high value for the property indicates a lower priority and therefore draws the glyph at the bottom-most Z order position on an activity designer. 值字段为 1000000。The value of the field is 1000000. > [!NOTE] > 此常数值用作创建自定义标志符号时的一个准则。This constant value serves as a guideline when creating custom glyphs. 设计自定义标志符号时，可以对 属性随意使用不同的值。You are free to use different values for the property when designing your custom glyph.

summary.span: 表示 的正常优先级。

span.span: Represents the normal priority for a .
This value is a constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的值越小，表示优先级越高；而该值越大，表示优先级越低。A lower value for the property indicates a higher priority whereas a higher value indicates a lower priority. 字段的值为 10000。The value of the field is 10000. > [!NOTE] > 此常数值用作创建自定义标志符号时的一个准则。This constant value serves as a guideline when creating custom glyphs. 设计自定义标志符号时，可以对 属性随意使用不同的值。You are free to use different values for the property when designing your custom glyph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 来绘制注释标志符号的边界并使用 进行填充。 uses to draw the bounds of the comment glyph and to fill it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法。The following code example demonstrates how you can override the method. 该代码自定义在与标志符号关联的活动设计器上绘制标志符号对象的方式。The code customizes how to draw the glyph object on the activity designer with which the glyph is associated. 此代码示例摘自工作流监视器 SDK 示例中的 DesignerGlyphProvider.cs 文件。This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the DesignerGlyphProvider.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[工作流监视器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2)。For more information, see [Workflow Monitor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2). MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Priority As Integer
public: virtual property int Priority { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取活动设计图面上的设计器标志符号的优先级设置。

span.span: Gets the priority setting for the designer glyph on the activity design surface.

value.span: 一个整数值，表示活动设计器图面上 的优先级设置。

span.span: An integer value that represents the priority setting for the on the activity designer surface.

value.span: 该值越小，表示优先级越高，因此会在活动设计器的 Z 顺序的最顶层位置绘制标志符号。

span.span: A lower value indicates a higher priority and therefore draws the glyph at the top-most Z order position on an activity designer.
